description: Lists the license type conversion tasks for your account.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters to scope the results. Valid filters are ResourceArns and Status. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return more specific results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. Name (string) --- Name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The value of the filter, which is case-sensitive. You can only specify one value for the filter. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: Name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The value of the filter, which is case-sensitive. You can only specify one value for the filter.

nested_items.name: LicenseConversionTasks
nested_items.description: Information about the license configuration tasks for your account.

nested_items.name: LicenseConversionTaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the license type conversion task.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource associated with the license type conversion task.

nested_items.name: SourceLicenseContext
nested_items.description: Information about the license type this conversion task converted from.

nested_items.name: UsageOperation
nested_items.description: The Usage operation value that corresponds to the license type you are converting your resource from. For more information about which platforms correspond to which usage operation values see Sample data: usage operation by platform.

nested_items.name: DestinationLicenseContext
nested_items.description: Information about the license type this conversion task converted to.

nested_items.name: UsageOperation
nested_items.description: The Usage operation value that corresponds to the license type you are converting your resource from. For more information about which platforms correspond to which usage operation values see Sample data: usage operation by platform.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the conversion task.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for the conversion task.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time the conversion task was started at.

nested_items.name: LicenseConversionTime
nested_items.description: The time the usage operation value of the resource was changed.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time the conversion task was completed.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Token for the next set of results.
